member.name: T:SOUP.Behaviors.ContentTransitionBehavior
member.summary: Attached behavior that provides animated content transitions for ContentControl elements.

remarks.para: When enabled, this behavior animates the content with a fade-in and slide-up effect when the control is loaded. The animation uses easing for a smooth, natural feel.
Usage in XAML: <ContentControl behaviors:ContentTransitionBehavior.EnableTransition="True" />

member.param: The dependency object to get the value from.
member.returns: true if transitions are enabled; otherwise, false.

true to enable transitions; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:SOUP.Core.Entities.ExpireWise.ExpirationItem
member.summary: Represents an item with expiration date tracking and status calculation.

remarks.para: This entity tracks products by their expiration dates and calculates status based on configurable thresholds. The actual expiry date is normalized to the last day of the expiry month for consistent comparisons.

Status thresholds can be configured via and static properties:
Critical: At or below critical threshold (default 7 days)
Warning: At or below warning threshold (default 30 days)
Good: More than warning threshold days until expiration
Expired: Past expiration date

Helper that maps card visuals into a simple 2-column grid and computes an insertion index based on mouse position. Supports single- and double-wide cards (double-wide occupy both columns in a row).
This is intentionally conservative: it inspects ActualWidth/Height of card Borders and the panel width to determine spans.

member.name: M:SOUP.Features.OrderLog.Behaviors.CardShiftAnimator.AnimateSwap(System.Windows.FrameworkElement,System.Double)
member.summary: Animates a single card to swap positions. Used for iOS-style slide-past reordering. The card slides to an offset position while the dragged card passes by.

The absolute Y offset to animate to (positive = move down, negative = move up)

member.name: T:SOUP.Features.OrderLog.Behaviors.OrderLogFluidDragBehavior
member.summary:
Fluid drag-and-drop behavior for OrderLog cards with smooth animations.
Features: - iOS-like fluid card shifting during drag - Ctrl+Drag to link items instead of reorder - Multi-item drag support - Hardware accelerated: GPU-rendered transforms, no layout invalidation

member.name: T:SOUP.Services.NavigationService
member.summary: Service for managing navigation between application modules and views.

member.name: T:SOUP.ViewModels.AllocationBuddyRPGViewModel
member.summary: ViewModel for the Allocation Buddy module, managing inventory allocation across store locations.

remarks.para:
This ViewModel provides functionality for:
Importing allocation data from Excel, CSV, or clipboard
Managing item allocations across multiple store locations
Moving items between locations and an item pool
Exporting allocation data to Excel or CSV
Auto-archiving data to preserve state between sessions
Data is automatically archived before imports and when the application closes, ensuring no data loss between sessions.

member.name: T:SOUP.ViewModels.EssentialsBuddyViewModel
member.summary: ViewModel for the Essentials Buddy module, managing essential inventory items and stock levels.

remarks.para:
This module helps track essential items that should always be in stock, providing:
Import of inventory data from Excel or CSV files
Automatic matching against the item dictionary to identify essential items
Filtering by stock status (Normal, Low, Out of Stock, Sufficient)
Automatic addition of missing essential items with zero quantity
Persistent storage of data between sessions

member.summary: Base class for all ViewModels in the application.

remarks.para: This abstract class inherits from provided by CommunityToolkit.Mvvm, which implements and provides property change notification infrastructure.
All ViewModels should inherit from this class to ensure consistent behavior and to allow for application-wide ViewModel functionality to be added later.
